55-year-old.context: The patient is a 55-year-old female who has had chronic nasal obstruction secondary to nasal polyps and chronic sinusitis.

chronic nasal obstruction.context: The patient is a 55-year-old female who has had chronic nasal obstruction secondary to nasal polyps and chronic sinusitis.

nasal polyps.context: The patient is a 55-year-old female who has had chronic nasal obstruction secondary to nasal polyps and chronic sinusitis.

chronic sinusitis.context: The patient is a 55-year-old female who has had chronic nasal obstruction secondary to nasal polyps and chronic sinusitis.

septal deviation.context: She also has a septal deviation mid posterior to the left compromising greater than 70% of her nasal airway.

Ethmoidectomy.context: Ethmoidectomy, antrostomy with polyp removal, turbinectomy, and septoplasty.

Antrostomy.context: Ethmoidectomy, antrostomy with polyp removal, turbinectomy, and septoplasty.

Polyp removal.context: Ethmoidectomy, antrostomy with polyp removal, turbinectomy, and septoplasty.

Turbinectomy.context: Ethmoidectomy, antrostomy with polyp removal, turbinectomy, and septoplasty.

Septoplasty.context: Ethmoidectomy, antrostomy with polyp removal, turbinectomy, and septoplasty.

Left chronic anterior and posterior ethm.context: 1. Left chronic anterior and posterior ethmoiditis.

Left chronic maxillary sinusitis with po.context: 2. Left chronic maxillary sinusitis with polyps.

Right anterior and posterior chronic eth.context: 4. Right anterior and posterior chronic ethmoiditis.

Right chronic maxillary sinusitis with p.context: 5. Right chronic maxillary sinusitis with polyps.

Intranasal deformity.context: 7. Intranasal deformity causing nasal obstruction due to septal deviation.

Bilateral endoscopic sinus surgery.context: Name Of Operation: Bilateral endoscopic sinus surgery, including left anterior and posterior ethmoidectomy, left maxillary antrostomy with polyp removal, left inferior partial turbinectomy, right anterior and posterior ethmoidectomy, right maxillary antrostomy and polyp removal, right partial inferior turbinectomy, and septoplasty.

Lidocaine 1% with 1:100,000 epinephrine.context: Lidocaine 1% with 1:100,000 epinephrine was injected into the region of the anterior portion of the nasal septum.

#15 blade.context: A #15 blade and the Freer elevator were used to help make a standard hemitransfixion incision.

Freer elevator.context: A #15 blade and the Freer elevator were used to help make a standard hemitransfixion incision.

Jansen-Middleton forceps.context: The bony deflection was removed using Jansen-Middleton forceps.

Richards essential shaver.context: The polyps were removed using the Richards essential shaver to help identify the middle turbinate and uncinate process better.

Back-biting forceps.context: The uncinate process was removed systematically superiorly to inferiorly with back-biting forceps.

30-degree endoscope.context: The anterior and posterior ethmoid air cells were entered primarily and dissected with the Richards essential shaver followed by the use of a 30-degree endoscope and up-biting forceps for the superior and lateral dissection.

Up-biting forceps.context: The anterior and posterior ethmoid air cells were entered primarily and dissected with the Richards essential shaver followed by the use of a 30-degree endoscope and up-biting forceps for the superior and lateral dissection.

Suction Bovie apparatus.context: Any obvious bleeding points along the edge were controlled with the suction Bovie apparatus.

Q-tip.context: Any obvious bleeding points along the edge were controlled with the suction Bovie apparatus.

Gelfilm packing.context: A thorough irrigation was then carried out in the nasal cavity, and Gelfilm packing was used to coat the linings in the middle meatal regions.
